sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from "react"; import ReactCardFlip from 'react-card-flip'; import {Card,Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import '../Styles/App.css'; import '../Styles/style.css'; const FlipCard =(props)=> { const [isFlipped,setIsFlipped]=useState(false); let display = ""; if(props.tot!==""){ display="none"; } const handleClick=()=>{ setIsFlipped(!isFlipped); }; return (

Cases in {props.country.toUpperCase()}

Total

{props.tot}

Recovered

{props.rec}

Deaths

{props.dth}


Statistics taken at :- {props.stats}


Global Cases

Total

{props.total}

Recovered

{props.recovered}

Deaths

{props.deaths}

) } export default FlipCard;
